item.title: Theologiae Viae
item.description: The theology of the people of God, wandering in the faith of Abraham and Sarah, is a theology of the way - a theologia viae - not yet a theology of the home country, a theologia patriae. It is a theology of exile and exodus, and in all its images and concepts it bears the stamp of the far-off land itself out of which these images and concepts are to lead us.
